analysis.description:
LegalTGE.contribute (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#709-762) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in LegalTGE.contribute (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#709-762):
	External calls:
	- verificationLevel = getVerificationLevel() (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#713-716)
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#758-759)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- state (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#760)

LegalTGE.setLegalToken (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#553-563) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(instContWallet,instContAllocatedTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#559-560)

LegalTGE.contribute (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#709-762) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#760-761)

LegalTGE.finalize (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#865-886) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#877-879)

LegalTGE.allocateTeamBonusTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#897-912) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,_teamBonusTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#902-904)

VestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#1310-1316) shadows:

LegalTGE.allocateTeamBonusTokens has external calls inside a loop:

LegalTGE.allocateTeamBonusTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.grantVestedTokens(teamBonuses[i].toAddress,_teamBonusTokens,uint64(now),teamBonuses[i].cliffDate,teamBonuses[i].vestingDate,false,false) (/unique_chucks/13/0x200993b5be00828b7d22aa02283b9cd36352028b.sol#904-911)
